meanings.definition: The quality of being adapted or suitable for a particular purpose or situation.
meanings.sent1: Her adaptedness to the cold weather impressed everyone at the ski resort.
meanings.sent2: The adaptedness of the new employee to the company culture was remarkable.
meanings.sent3: His adaptedness to telling jokes made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: The adaptedness of the puzzle pieces to fit perfectly together was like magic.
meanings.sent5: The adaptedness of the superhero to different challenges made him a fan favorite.

meanings.definition: The state of being adapted or adjusted to a new environment or situation.
meanings.sent1: The adaptedness of the plants to the desert climate was fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: After a few weeks, her adaptedness to the new school was evident.
meanings.sent3: The adaptedness of the cat to wearing a tiny hat was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His adaptedness to the chaos around him was like a calm in the storm.
meanings.sent5: The adaptedness of the chameleon to changing colors was truly remarkable.
